title: 🛠 Microsoft Office for Mac – Quick Setup & Fixes
content: Last updated: April 2025 Hey there! If Microsoft Office is giving you trouble, start here. Whether you're setting it up for the first time or running into issues, we've got your back. *BEFORE TRYING ANY STEP, SAVE YOUR PROGRESS * ✅ First Things First: How to Install Office the Right Way Let’s make sure you’re on the latest version. Open Okta Click the Office 365 tile [Image] In the top-right, click Install and more [Image] Choose Install Microsoft 365 Apps [Image] From there just Install Office! ✅ *Common Issues* If you get this error: [Image] Let the #Digital-workplace team know so we make sure you have the right access to your account Now you’re ready to install and sign in with your Simplifi email! 👉 Use your full email + password (FastPass won’t work here) 🚑 Common Fixes (Fast + Friendly) 🧱 Stuck on “Browser Not Supported”? [Image] No worries! This means you do not have a license to that supports the Microsoft Office! 👉 Reach out to #digital-workplace to confirm your license is showing for your account. ✅ Once Confirmed Quit the app Sign back in! 👉 Use your full email + password (FastPass won’t work here) 🔄 Apps Not Updating? [Image] Your Using an Older Microsoft License Account That Has Had Its Last Days! Here’s a quick refresh: Delete Microsoft AutoUpdate and your Office apps Reinstall fresh from Microsoft Office Using How to Install Office the Right Way 👆 Open your apps and let them update You should be good to go! ✅ 🔒 Can’t Edit? Says “View Only”? [Image] This just means your license needs a little nudge. Open Excel Click The Excel Tab in the top left corner of your Navigation, Next to the apple logo [Image] About Excel [Image] More Info [Image] Refresh License [Image] This has been a on going issue, so every case is different! Reach out to #digital-workplace if this doesn’t fix your issue 🧾 File Locked or Not Opening? ❌ Can’t Save? [Image][Image][Image] Let’s fix that: Quit Excel completely (Force Quit if needed) Wait until it fully closes Try opening the file again Still no luck? Move the file to your Desktop and try again 💬 Still need a hand? Send us a message on the #digital-workplace slack channel & tell us where you're stuck!
